movies.title: Onimusha: Dawn of Dreams
movies.plot: It's been almost two decades since the fall of Japanese warlord Nobunaga Oda. The fallen ruler's own vassal Hideyoshi Toyotomi has succeeded in uniting Japan under the banner of peace... until June 29th, 1596 when a strange, glowing planet appears in the sky. From that moment on, Hideyoshi is transformed into a power-mad dictator and the country is rocked by natural disasters. Soon an evil army of demons appears; disorder spreads across the country; people are lost; and villages are burned to the ground. Just when it seems Japan is approaching its darkest hour, a mysterious warrior appears on the scene to try and stop the havoc. He's Soki, Oni of the Ash -- otherwise known as "The Blue Demon." The latest chapter in Japan's epic struggle between good and evil has begun.
movies.simplePlot: It's been almost two decades since the fall of Japanese warlord Nobunaga Oda. The fallen ruler's own vassal Hideyoshi Toyotomi has succeeded in uniting Japan under the banner of peace... ...

biography.bio: Toshiyuki Kusuda is an actor, known for Onimusha: Dawn of Dreams (2006), Street Fighter IV (2008) and The Prince of Tennis (2001).
biography.name: Toshiyuki Kusuda

biography.bio: Yukana Nogami was born on January 6, 1975 in Chiba, Japan. She is an actress, known for Moldiver (1993), Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion (2006) and Time of Eve (2010).
biography.name: Yukana Nogami

biography.bio: Sanae Kobayashi was born on January 26, 1980 in Shizuoka, Japan. She is an actress, known for D.Gray-man (2006), Macross Zero (2002) and Elfen Lied (2004).
biography.name: Sanae Kobayashi

biography.bio: Wataru Hatano was born on March 13, 1982 in Nagano, Japan. He is an actor, known for Polar Bear's Café (2012), Jormungand (2012) and Onimusha: Dawn of Dreams (2006).
biography.name: Wataru Hatano

biography.bio: Hideo Ishikawa was born on December 13, 1969 in Amagasaki, Hyogo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005) and Re: Cutie Honey (2004).
biography.name: Hideo Ishikawa

biography.bio: Norio Wakamoto was born on October 18, 1945 in Yamaguchi, Japan as Noriaki Wakamoto. He is known for his work on Metropolis (2001), Ninja Scroll (1993) and Dragon Ball Z (1989).
biography.name: Norio Wakamoto

biography.bio: Keiji Fujiwara was born on October 5, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Eureka Seven (2005) and Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters (2012).
biography.name: Keiji Fujiwara

biography.bio: Kenta Miyake was born on August 23, 1977 in Okinawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Wolf's Rain (2003), Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent (2013) and Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King (2012).
biography.name: Kenta Miyake

biography.bio: Masaharu Satô is an actor, known for Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods (2013), Dragon Ball Z: La Résurrection de 'F' (2015) and Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009).
biography.name: Masaharu Satô

biography.bio: Tôru Ohkawa was born on February 28, 1960 in Kagoshima, Japan. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Naruto SD: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals (2012) and Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society (2006).
biography.name: Tôru Ohkawa

biography.bio: Yasunori Masutani was born on July 5, 1947 in Sapporo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Armitage III (1995), Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods (2013) and Dynasty Warriors 7 (2011).
biography.name: Yasunori Masutani

biography.bio: Sakiko Tamagawa was born on January 20, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Summer Wars (2009), Ranma ½: The Movie, Big Trouble in Nekonron, China (1991) and Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society (2006). She is married to Shûichi Ikeda.
biography.name: Sakiko Tamagawa

biography.bio: Mari Yokô is an actress, known for Wicked City (1987), The Jungle Book: The Adventures of Mowgli (1989) and Mad Bull 34 (1990).
biography.name: Mari Yokô

biography.bio: Iho Hayakawa is an actress, known for Onimusha: Dawn of Dreams (2006).
biography.name: Iho Hayakawa

biography.bio: Shôzô Îzuka was born on May 23, 1933 in Fukushima, Japan. He is an actor, known for Tokyo Godfathers (2003), Millennium Actress (2001) and Himitsu Sentai Gorenger (1975).
biography.name: Shôzô Îzuka
